name: Dino Cove
description:
The dinosaurs started such a lovely day on the beach, only to have their forts assaulted by the sea!

Frantically mash your keyboard in an effort to keep your fortresses alive!

Sounds like the instructions could be a little better.

Selecting the little grey box above the squirt bottle in the bottom right lets you hit any key (that is not currently in use).  You can then click on any free square, and your dino will appear. From now on, every time you want to shoot with the dinosaur, you need to hit the key you assigned for them. Click on coins to pay for more dinosaurs!

Sorry for the confusion!
